Sentencas: Cobalt-based perovskite exhibit fascinating physical properties at the nanoscale.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: Better oxygen transport, higher ionic/electronic mixed conductivity and enhanced electrocatalytic activity are some of the most important highlighted properties compared to bulk perovskites.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: Such materials have proved to be excellent candidates for applications in solid oxide fuel cells and supercapacitors.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: In this work, a technological approach using highly ordered porous anodic aluminum oxide (AAO) as a template for the synthesis of low dimensional SrCo0.95V0.05O3 cubic perovskite is introduced.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: Thus, the impregnation of AAO membranes in two different mixed oxide precursor solutions, citric acid, on the one hand, and tartaric acid on the another hand, followed by thermal treatments and alumina dissolution, led to the successful synthesis of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: By means of the Rietveld method refinement of the XRD data, the perovskite crystallization in a Pm-3m cubic system, as well as some crystalline phases of alumina were identified.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: FT-IR results showed the presence of a band at similar to 580 cm(-1) for the nanostructured perovskites, attributed to the asymmetric stretching of the (Co/V)-O bonds, in good agreement with those exhibited by bulk perovskites.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: In addition, the capacitive behavior of composite electrodes prepared with low dimensional perovskites and lubricating graphite was monitored by cyclic voltammetry and galvanostatic charge/discharge cycles.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices

Sentencas: Our results show an improved supercapacitive performance of the nanostructured perovskite respect to that obtained for the bulk configuration, indicating that nanostructured SrCo0.95V0.05O3 perovskite arises as a promising candidate material for supercapacitor devices.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of alumina-embedded SrCo0.95V0.05O3 nanostructured perovskite: An attractive material for supercapacitor devices
